name: data:cell:beforechange
description: Fires the event before a single cell value is changed.

returns.description: The DOM cell that was updated.
returns.name: DOMCell

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The column index e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: fieldIndex

returns.description: The new value of the cell.
returns.name: newValue

returns.description: The old value of the cell.
returns.name: oldValue

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: data:cell:change
description: Fires the event after a single cell value is changed.

returns.description: The DOM cell that was updated.
returns.name: DOMCell

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The column index e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: fieldIndex

returns.description: The new value of the cell.
returns.name: newValue

returns.description: The old value of the cell.
returns.name: oldValue

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: data:load
description: Fires the event every time a new dataset is loaded in the grid.

name: data:record:beforechange
description: Fires the event before a record (row) is changed.

returns.description: The column indices that were changed e.g. ["firstName","lastName"].
returns.name: changedField

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The old data object associated with that record.
returns.name: oldData

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: data:record:beforedelete
description: Fires the event before a record (row) is deleted from the grid.

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: data:record:beforeinsert
description: Fires the event before a new record (row) is added to the grid.

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: data:record:change
description: Fires the event after a record (row) is changed.

returns.description: The column indices that were changed e.g. ["firstName","lastName"].
returns.name: changedField

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The old data object associated with that record.
returns.name: oldData

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: data:record:delete
description: Fires the event when a record (row) is deleted from the grid.

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: data:record:insert
description: Fires the event after a new record (row) is added to the grid.

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: data:record:openinsert
description: Fires event when the insert dialog is opened

returns.description: The container for all of the input fields on the new dialog
returns.name: ZGData.inputContainer

returns.description: An array of references to each label and edit field inside the new dialog
returns.name: ZGData.editorFields

returns.description: A reference to the DOM dialog.
returns.name: ZGTarget
